articles.title: Avengers star Jeremy Renner in 'critical but stable' condition after accident - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Hawkeye actor was plowing snow when the accident occurred on New Year's Day (Jan 1).
articles.content:
Avengers star Jeremy Renner is being treated for serious injuries that happened while he was plowing snow, the actors representative said Sunday (Jan 1).

articles.author: Heather Chen
articles.title: Philippines: Thousands stranded on New Year's Day as power outage hits Manila airport - CNN
articles.description: Chaos erupted on New Year's Day in the Philippines after a severe airport power outage temporarily impacted air traffic control, disrupting nearly 300 flights and leaving tens of thousands of travelers stranded in the Southeast Asian hub.
articles.content: Chaos erupted on New Years Day in the Philippines after a severe power outage temporarily impacted air traffic control at the countrys largest airport, disrupting nearly 300 flights and leaving tens … [+5106 chars]

articles.title: Diabetes risk from eating too much sugar, or too little - Lifestyle Asia Hong Kong
articles.description: Sugar alone doesn’t cause diabetes. However, it does have an indirect effect on insulin resistance or diabetes.
articles.content: Eating too much sugar doesn’t directly cause diabetes. However, there is a correlation (association) between being overweight or having obesity and type 2 diabetes. Over time, consuming too many food… [+13713 chars]
